Package gw.solr.consistency

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsistencyProcessor
    ConsistencyTracker
    Consistency tracking mechanism. Caches recent update messages for a Solr document so that if a subsequent message has used invalid data (typically due to stale reads because of late or missed cached evictions), then the message can be reconstructed from the proper data and sent along.
    ConsistencyTrackerBuilder
    Builder for consistency tracker. Allows configuration of cache size and timing as well as forces provision of the document reconstructor
    DeleteProcessor
    IKeyGenerator
    Interface that provides a mapping from the URN for a Solr document to the key that is used for the consistency cache to match related Solr document updates and deletes. Pass an implementation of this interface to the consistency tracker builder that provides the appropriate mapping (such as stripping or modifying a digest key). Defaults to using the URN for the key, which will be correct for most cases.
    IReconstructor
    If a solr update message fails a consistency check, then the message must be reconstructed properly from the correct set of beans. This is performed by passing an implementation of this interface to the Solr messaging plugin's ConsistencyTracker instance.
    UpdateProcessor
    UrnKeyGenerator
